insights.root_cause: Fluctuations in transactions or incorrect postings may cause variations.
insights.recommendation: Review transaction history and verify postings for accuracy.

insights.bucket_description: No clear pattern, but deviation exceeds threshold
insights.root_cause: Random errors or unanticipated transactions could cause deviations.
insights.recommendation: Conduct a detailed audit to identify unexpected entries.

insights.bucket_description: Consistent increase or decrease in outstanding balances
insights.root_cause: Systematic errors or trends in transactions might result in consistent changes.
insights.recommendation: Analyze transaction patterns over time to identify trends or errors.

insights.root_cause: Detected entries suggest corrections or reversals of previous transactions.
insights.recommendation: Confirm the purpose and accuracy of reversal entries with relevant documentation.

insights.bucket_description: Outstanding balances are not in line with previous months
insights.root_cause: Changes in business operations or accounting errors may cause discrepancies.
insights.recommendation: Compare with historical data to identify discrepancies and rectify them.

insights.bucket_description: Gradual deviation beyond threshold over multiple periods
insights.root_cause: Cumulative errors or gradual changes in transaction processes can lead to deviations.
insights.recommendation: Investigate cumulative data over periods to pinpoint the source of deviation.

insights.bucket_description: High volatility in account balances over time
insights.root_cause: Frequent transactions or market conditions may cause high volatility.
insights.recommendation: Assess transaction frequency and market factors affecting account balances.
